basic.Peptide Name: Bactridin-2 (Bact2, Bactridine 2; P-Mice-Antm-beta* NaTx14.8; Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtillis ICTA-07 (MIC=30 µM), Microccocus luteus ATCC 4698 (MIC=27 µM), Enterococcus faecalis WHO14 (MIC=65 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC=54 µM), Yersinia enterocolitica ATCC 9610 (MIC=46 µM), Acinetobacter calcoaceticus ATCC 2305-5 (MIC=27 µM).
